divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the second time this craft has came over my house. Its has bright lights and moves forwards and sideways at once. When it approached my house the lights shut off immediately to show a triangle shape with blue and red lights on each point. The first time I saw this the monday before but around 5:45am and that time it disappeared quickly and made no sounds. This time it went over the house slowly and had a very low rumbling sound that did not sound like any plane I have heard and about 5 minutes later after the object was no longer in sight several helicopters followed in the same path.
Summary: Triangle with large lights that shut off when approached house and had 3 lights to show triangle shape
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Milton
There were no other sightings in Milton on or around November 17th 2008
